longDesc: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
detailedDesc: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness... It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness...

longDesc: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
detailedDesc: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time. He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

longDesc: Edgar the Human Swordpupil is standing here, looking quite lost.
detailedDesc: Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?' Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'  You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

longDesc: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.
detailedDesc: It looks quite strong. It looks quite strong.

longDesc: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
detailedDesc: He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe. He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe. Then again, he may just have a headache.

longDesc: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
detailedDesc: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon. He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

longDesc: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.
detailedDesc: Tatorious winks at you mischievously. Tatorious winks at you mischievously.

longDesc: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
detailedDesc: She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen, She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen, but she certainly fits what you would expect in a tower fulls of mages.

longDesc: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
detailedDesc: This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot. This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot.

longDesc: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
detailedDesc: Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they must have been fine garments.  A metal muzzle has been fitted over the poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence his spell casting you cannot tell.  He looks quite mad, no doubt he has been mistreated horribly.

longDesc: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.
detailedDesc: He looks rather dirty. He looks rather dirty.

longDesc: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
detailedDesc: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!' The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

longDesc: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
detailedDesc: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone. The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

longDesc: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.
detailedDesc: The eyes smoulder with hatred. The eyes smoulder with hatred.

longDesc: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.
detailedDesc: He looks quite sleepy. He looks quite sleepy.

longDesc: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
detailedDesc: She looks quite intent on her studies. She looks quite intent on her studies.

longDesc: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
detailedDesc: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing. He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

longDesc: A young apprentice is sleeping here.
detailedDesc: He seems to be dreaming. He seems to be dreaming.

longDesc: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
detailedDesc: He looks like a mischievous youth. He looks like a mischievous youth.

longDesc: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
detailedDesc: The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor burns mark its mottled coat.

longDesc: A student of spells is here looking quite bored.
detailedDesc: The student yawns. The student yawns.

longDesc: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
detailedDesc: He looks quite angry at your interruption. He looks quite angry at your interruption.

longDesc: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
detailedDesc: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell. He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

longDesc: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
detailedDesc: The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening. The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening.

longDesc: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
detailedDesc: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom. She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

longDesc: An old wizard is here making a speech here.
detailedDesc: This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest living man.  Of course, having heard stories about some of the magic available to the people living here, and what toll the magic draws... this man might be as young as you.

longDesc: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
detailedDesc: This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend himself.

longDesc: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
detailedDesc: She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic user.

longDesc: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
detailedDesc: The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult spells, and inattentive students.

longDesc: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
detailedDesc: Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right now, better not wake him up.

longDesc: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
detailedDesc: He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right now.

longDesc: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
detailedDesc: She is quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of She is quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of lore she is translating.

longDesc: The Master Scribe is here looking a little upset
detailedDesc: He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle. He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle. The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

longDesc: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
detailedDesc: You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents, You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents, since those ones are rolled and sealed with wax.

longDesc: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
detailedDesc: The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could either destroy the weapon or make it many times more powerful than it already is.

longDesc: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.
detailedDesc: It looks quite sharp. It looks quite sharp.

longDesc: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
detailedDesc: He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions.  His eyes dart He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions.  His eyes dart around wildly, and he starts to drool.  The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

longDesc: The Master Summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
detailedDesc: The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control over the gateway before he loses his soul to the creatures on the other side of it.

longDesc: The Master Charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
detailedDesc: The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet. The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

longDesc: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.
detailedDesc: He looks flammable. He looks flammable.

longDesc: The Master Spellbinder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
detailedDesc: The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks. The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks.

longDesc: The Golem Maker is here chiseling some stone.
detailedDesc: The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to the point of fussing over it.

longDesc: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
detailedDesc: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you. It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

longDesc: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.
detailedDesc: He looks rather dim witted. He looks rather dim witted.

longDesc: A flesh golem stands guard here
detailedDesc: It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't even resemble anything human.

longDesc: A cloth golem wanders around here.
detailedDesc: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk. It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

longDesc: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
detailedDesc: It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable, It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable, but somewhat un-intelligent.

longDesc: A clay golem stands guard here.
detailedDesc: This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt. This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt.

longDesc: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
detailedDesc: The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon was now stands a small harmless looking old man.

longDesc: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.
detailedDesc: Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow. The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

longDesc: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
detailedDesc: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly. It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

longDesc: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
detailedDesc: This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an enormous zombie.

longDesc: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
detailedDesc: She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes your skin crawl with revulsion.

longDesc: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
detailedDesc: He looks like a rather peaceful old man. He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

longDesc: The Master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
detailedDesc: A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the Great Master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover alone.

longDesc: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
detailedDesc: The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large claws.

longDesc: The Master of Neutrality is here contemplating the balance of the Universe.
detailedDesc: He looks quite peaceful. He looks quite peaceful.

longDesc: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
detailedDesc: She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

longDesc: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
detailedDesc: It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of the question.

shortDesc: the Master of the Black Robes
longDesc: The Master of the Black Robes is here plotting vile deeds.
detailedDesc: The Master glares at you. The Master glares at you.

longDesc: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
detailedDesc: He looks like a fanatic. He looks like a fanatic. The white robed apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honour!'

longDesc: A white cat is here preening its fur.
detailedDesc: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws. It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

longDesc: The Master of Goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
detailedDesc: He looks like a self-righteous bastard. He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

longDesc: A large calico cat is lounging about here.
detailedDesc: It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species. It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species. A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

longDesc: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
detailedDesc: She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her youthful appearance through the use of strong magics. The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.
